channel.title: Xteleall command
channel.description: ANYONE got the xteleall command? i need it thank you.

item.title: Xteleall command
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Whip Mod Whip
item.description:
@Mod_Whip wrote:

[quote=“Rich Dude99, post:4, topic:265809”][font=Century Gothic]Hiya,

When you say “Xteleall”, what do you mean by that? Teleport everyone to a certain location, or teleport them all to you. Please be a little more specific and as “pure ess ftw” stated, we are not a spoon-feeding enviroment so try and help yourself a little before you completely ask for other’s coding.

-Rich Dude99[/font][/quote]
Basically what he’ll need is a command that grabs the # of players and his current x and y coords, then use a for loop to teleport all the players to him.

Read full topic

item.title: Xteleall command

item.description:
@Rich_Dude99 wrote:

[font=Century Gothic][color=blue]Hiya,

Obviously theres no rule against it, and since its part of the “post editing” toolbar, I don’t see a problem with it. But your little post:

Gflo:

Is it really necessary to post blue text? It’s Hella annoying

[font=Century Gothic]is very unnecessary, but thanks for noticing my amazing text!

-Rich Dude99[/font]
